note.p: Mother of Robert Myddelton Biddulph. Born Charlotte Myddelton, daughter and co-heir of Richard Myddelton MP of Chirk Castle, Denbighshire. Inherited Chirk Castle on the death of her brother, Richard Myddelton MP, in 1796. Married Robert Biddulph MP (1761-1814) of Cofton Hall, Worcestershire, and took Myddelton as an additional surname in 1801.
Denbighshire, Wales, Anglican baptisms, marriages and burials, 1556–1994 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 May 2022)
